title: Philippines
summary: Philippines is a country in South-Eastern Asia. The capital is Manila. Population: 114.1 million. Area: 342,353 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Philippines is composed of two equal horizontal bands of blue and red, with a white equilateral triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle has its base on the hoist end, spans about two-fifth the width of the field and bears a central golden-yellow sun with eight rays and a five-pointed golden-yellow star at each vertex.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
